data.route_analysis: Sweden is well-connected by train, bus, and internal flights. Major cities include Stockholm, Gothenburg, and Malmö. Snow transportation options like skiing and sledding are available. Local transport offers winter special routes.
data.pricing_trends: Winter travel to Sweden usually sees higher prices due to increased demand, especially during holiday seasons. Prices for flights can spike in December and January.
data.seasonal_patterns: December to February is peak winter season with heavy snowfall. January usually offers the best skiing conditions.
data.booking_windows: Optimal booking time is 3-4 months ahead of the travel date for best deals. Last-minute bookings tend to be costly.

destination_insights.route_analysis: Sweden is well-connected by train, bus, and internal flights. Major cities include Stockholm, Gothenburg, and Malmö. Snow transportation options like skiing and sledding are available. Local transport offers winter special routes.
destination_insights.seasonal_patterns: December to February is peak winter season with heavy snowfall. January usually offers the best skiing conditions.

market_insights.pricing_trends: Winter travel to Sweden usually sees higher prices due to increased demand, especially during holiday seasons. Prices for flights can spike in December and January.
market_insights.booking_windows: Optimal booking time is 3-4 months ahead of the travel date for best deals. Last-minute bookings tend to be costly.
market_insights.demand: Strong interest in winter sports and Christmas markets drives demand during winter months.
market_insights.competition: Alternative winter travel destinations include Norway and Finland, but Sweden's unique winter experience attracts tourists too.

trend_insights.market_trends: Increased interest in sustainable tourism and winter adventure packages. Market shifts towards customized travel experiences for winter activities.
trend_insights.consumer_behavior: Consumers are looking for all-inclusive packages that offer a combination of travel, lodging, and experiences in Sweden's winter wonderland.
trend_insights.competitive_landscape: Sweden positions itself as a winter wonderland, competing with Norway and Finland by offering unique attractions such as the Ice Hotel and Swedish Winter Sports. Unique marketing campaigns focus on experiences rather than just destinations.
trend_insights.seasonal_factors: Winter months see a surge in travelers seeking winter sports, cultural festivals, and holiday markets.
